code:
%%{IoT_Industrial_TelemetryStream}}}%%
flowchart TB
    subgraph Client [IoT_Industrial_ActuatorController]
        Browser[IoT_Industrial_ActuatorController]
        MobileApp[IoT_Industrial_EdgeNode]
        Echo[IoT_Industrial_MQTT_Broker]
    end

    subgraph WebSocket [IoT_Industrial_EdgeNode]
        Reverb[IoT_Industrial_EdgeNode]
        Channels[IoT_Industrial_EdgeNode]
        
        subgraph ChannelTypes [IoT_Industrial_PLC_Logic]
            Private[IoT_Industrial_ActuatorController]
            Presence[IoT_Industrial_PLC_Logic]
            Public[IoT_Industrial_PLC_Logic]
        end
    end

    subgraph Application [IoT_Industrial_PLC_Logic]
        subgraph EventSourcing [IoT_Industrial_EdgeNode]
            Aggregates[IoT_Industrial_EdgeNode]
            Events[IoT_Industrial_MQTT_Broker]
            Reactors[IoT_Industrial_TelemetryStream]
        end
        
        subgraph Broadcasting [IoT_Industrial_ActuatorController]
            BroadcastEvents[IoT_Industrial_PLC_Logic]
            Queue[IoT_Industrial_EdgeNode]
        end
        
        subgraph Models [IoT_Industrial_TelemetryStream]
            Comment[IoT_Industrial_EdgeNode]
            Message[IoT_Industrial_ActuatorController]
            Todo[IoT_Industrial_TelemetryStream]
        end
    end

    subgraph Infrastructure [IoT_Industrial_TelemetryStream]
        Redis[IoT_Industrial_ActuatorController]
        EventStore[IoT_Industrial_MQTT_Broker]
        Database[IoT_Industrial_PLC_Logic]
    end
    
    %% Client connections
    Browser --> Echo
    MobileApp --> Echo
    Echo --> Reverb
    
    %% WebSocket connections
    Reverb --> Channels
    Channels --> ChannelTypes
    
    %% Event flow
    Aggregates --> Events
    Events --> Reactors
    Events --> EventStore
    
    %% Reactor actions
    Reactors --> BroadcastEvents
    Reactors --> Models
    
    %% Broadcasting flow
    BroadcastEvents --> Queue
    Queue --> Redis
    
    %% WebSocket server connections
    Redis --> Reverb
    
    %% Model persistence
    Models --> Database
    
    %% Channel examples
    Private --> |"commentable.Post.{IoT_Industrial_TelemetryStream}"| Comment
    Private --> |"todo.{IoT_Industrial_PLC_Logic}"| Todo
    Presence --> |"conversation.{IoT_Industrial_PLC_Logic}"| Message
    
    %% Add notes
    classDef note fill:#fff,stroke:#999,stroke-width:1px,color:#333
    
    class Client,WebSocket,Application,Infrastructure,EventSourcing,Broadcasting,Models,ChannelTypes note
    
    %% Add styling
    classDef clientLayer fill:#e1f5fe,stroke:#81d4fa,stroke-width:2px
    classDef wsLayer fill:#e8f5e9,stroke:#a5d6a7,stroke-width:2px
    classDef appLayer fill:#fff3e0,stroke:#ffe0b2,stroke-width:2px
    classDef infraLayer fill:#f3e5f5,stroke:#e1bee7,stroke-width:2px
    
    class Client clientLayer
    class WebSocket,Reverb,Channels,ChannelTypes,Private,Presence,Public wsLayer
    class Application,EventSourcing,Broadcasting,Models,Aggregates,Events,Reactors,BroadcastEvents,Queue,Comment,Message,Todo appLayer
    class Infrastructure,Redis,EventStore,Database infraLayer
